title: How did tattoos become a symbol of love? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tattoos are not symbols of love at all,  but more an example of fetishactivity  that has  somehow reached the mainstream.  Like other temporary mainstream diversions, interest will wane and ultimately,wither. Tattoo parlors will return to whence they came, or becometattoo removal parlors. In a few years, tattoo removal will be a huge business as socialitesand would be successful types go through tattoo remorse, once experienced only by drunken sailors and  youngsters who got a tattooon a dare. Tattoo remorse anyone?
